Questions.B: Is the fire blanket readily accessible?
Questions.C: Are eyewashes operational and capped when not in use?
Questions.D: Are tops of cabinets not cluttered?
Questions.E: Are all personnel wearing safety glasses in designated areas?
Questions.F: Is food contained in designated areas?
Questions.G: Do all exit routes have clear access?
Questions.H: Are chemicals in use labeled with the 'right to know' NFPA code?
Questions.I: Are flammables (other than small dispensers) in flammables cabinet?
Questions.J: Do the fume hoods operate properly (air draw, lights shield)?
Questions.K: Is the hood on for acid digestions (P0, TKN, metals) & HCl cleaning?
Questions.L: Are the floors and aisles clear of obstructions & spills?
Questions.M: Are counter tops clear of spills, sharp objects, & clutter?
Questions.N: Do both chemical showers operate properly?
Questions.O: Is general housekeeping in good order?
Questions.P: Is general storage not a fire hazard (for example: chemicals that may react when stored or mixed together such as acids and bases or oil + oxidizer such as bleach etc)?
